name: 罗伯特·E·李
bio: 南方邦联军总司令。出身弗吉尼亚名门，西点军校毕业。虽个人反对奴隶制，但因忠于故乡选择为南方而战。军事才华卓越，最终因实力悬殊投降，战后致力于南北和解。
bio_en: Commanding general of the Confederate Army of Northern Virginia. A distinguished West Point graduate and Mexican-American War veteran who chose loyalty to his home state of Virginia over the Union. His tactical brilliance prolonged the war but ultimately could not overcome the North's material advantages. Surrendered at Appomattox Court House in April 1865.
